hero.title: Expert plumbing for your renovation
hero.subtitle: Bathroom remodels, kitchen upgrades, and whole-home renovations. We work with contractors and homeowners to deliver quality plumbing that meets code. From design to final inspection - beautiful, functional results.

about.title: Renovation Plumbing Experts
about.subtitle: Beautiful bathrooms, functional kitchens
about.content: RenovatePro specializes in plumbing for home renovations. We understand the coordination required between trades and work seamlessly with contractors or directly with homeowners. Quality fixtures, code-compliant work, and attention to detail.

products.name: Bathroom Remodel Plumbing
products.description: Complete bathroom plumbing including shower, tub, toilet, vanity. Rough-in to fixture installation. Permits included.

products.name: Kitchen Remodel Plumbing
products.description: Kitchen plumbing for sink, dishwasher, disposal, ice maker. Gas line for range if needed. Code-compliant.

products.name: Master Suite Addition
products.description: Complete plumbing for new master bath addition. Extend lines, install fixtures, luxury options available.

products.name: Whole-Home Repipe
products.description: Replace all supply lines with PEX. Perfect for renovations. Improve pressure and eliminate leaks.

products.name: Luxury Fixture Package
products.description: High-end fixtures supply and install. Kohler, Delta, Moen. Beautiful finishes for your dream space.

products.name: Outdoor Kitchen Plumbing
products.description: Plumbing for outdoor kitchen and bar. Sink, ice maker, and drainage. Extend your living space.

items.text: RenovatePro handled all plumbing for our master bath remodel. Professional coordination with our contractor, quality work, and passed inspection first time. The heated floors are amazing!
items.author: Rachel Martinez
items.title: Homeowner

items.text: We use them for all our remodeling projects. Reliable, skilled, and they understand the timeline pressures. Our clients love the quality of their work.
items.author: Tom Wilson
items.title: General Contractor

items.text: They helped us design the plumbing layout for our kitchen remodel and installed beautiful fixtures. Everything works perfectly. Would definitely use again!
items.author: Sarah Chen
items.title: Kitchen Remodel

members.name: Brian Foster
members.title: Owner & Master Plumber
members.bio: Licensed Master Plumber specializing in remodeling projects for 15+ years. Works with contractors and homeowners to deliver beautiful, code-compliant plumbing systems.

steps.title: Design Consultation
steps.description: Review plans and discuss fixture options and layouts

steps.title: Rough-In Work
steps.description: Install all supply and drain lines per code

steps.title: Fixture Installation
steps.description: Install fixtures and complete final inspection
